item.title: Netuitive StatsD
item.description: The Netuitive StatsD integration interprets, aggregates, and forwards custom metrics generated from your application. Using the values instrumented from your applicationâ€™s key actions and data (method calls, database queries, etc.), Metricly aggregates the values, associates them with corresponding metrics, and analyzes them in our analytics cycles. The Netuitive StatsD server comes pre-installed as part of the Linux Agent. We recommend setting up a Netuitive StatsD integration if you do not have a StatsD server already.
